product_name: DrybarHot Toddy Heat Protectant Mist Coconut Colada Scent
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeDrybar's Hot Toddy Heat Protectant Mist protects dry hair from heat styling with curling, straightening and styling irons.
details: DetailsBenefitsGreat for all hair types - Use lightly on fine hairProtects hair up to 450 F/232 C)Marula Oil: Coats hair strands to deliver protection from heat with a satin, frizz-free finishFire Tulip Extract: Protects against heat, leaving hair looking healthy and restoredHeat-Activated Rice Protein: Strengthens hair to protect it against the drying and damaging effects of heat stylingUV Protectors: Shield hair from UVA and UVB rays and excessive heat that cause dryness and color fadingCoconut Colada Scent: Notes of coconut water, muguet and coconutVeganCruelty-freeFormulated WithoutParabensSulfatesPhthalatesKeratinGlutenNuts/Nut OilsHoneyItem 2578793How To UseShake well. Lift sections of dry hair and spray throughout before using hot tools.IngredientsHydrofluorocarbon 152A, Alcohol Denat., Disiloxane, Propylene Glycol Dibenzoate, PPG-3 Benzyl Ether Myristate, Spathodea Campanulata Flower Extract, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Glycerin, Octylacrylamide/Acrylates/Butylaminoethyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Parfum (Fragrance), PPG-12 Dimethicone, , Aqua (Water, Eau), Butylene Glycol, Polyquaternium-59, Potassium Sorbate, Aminomethyl Propanol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Sorbic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Sodium Benzoate, Coumarin, Limonene, Eugenol, Benzyl Salicylate.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.This brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Shake well. Lift sections of dry hair and spray throughout before using hot tools.

reviews.headline: Buy this product again & again!
reviews.comments: I love how this product makes my hair look & smell.

reviews.headline: AMAZING
reviews.comments: Literally smells SO good. Very vanilla/perfume scent? Amazing. Also love that it gives texture

reviews.headline: works well
reviews.comments: I use this before I flat iron my bangs. spray it on a minute or 2 before I use the iron so it's dry so my hair doesn't steam lol I've been using it for a while and I like it. works well too if I'm using a curling iron or waver. a little goes a long way.

reviews.headline: Awful smell
reviews.comments:
As a product that is advertised as "unscented", you would expect no scent right?
Wrong, apparently. As someone who has chronic migraines that can be triggered by heavily scented things, I have to buy non-scented products. 
This dry shampoo smells heavily of coconut, which triggers my migraines. I also just generally hate the smell of coconut. 
If this doesnt bother you, buy it I guess. Just know you'll smell like sunscreen all day.

reviews.headline: NO! Just no!
reviews.comments: This made me feel like I had a ton of hairspray in my hair.

reviews.headline: The only DRY SHAMPOO I will buy from now on! shine for days!
reviews.comments: shiny and manageable

reviews.headline: DONT USE THIS!!!!
reviews.comments: As a pro stylist I have no problem getting on my knees and begging everyone of u to NOT use this!! Me and my salon coworker got together to test the bestselling heat protecting sprays and hot toddy was the worst and literally BURNF OFF the q tip, use the living proof one instead.

reviews.headline: I would buy it again
reviews.comments: This smells so good and protect your hair

reviews.headline: Made my hair dry
reviews.comments: I hated this heat protectant. It made my hair super dry and difficult to brush through.

reviews.headline: So far, it's good
reviews.comments: I prefer the feel of this on my hair over the Kenra, which comes out with a more sticky, hairspray ish feel to it that I don't like. There is no hairspray feel to Hot Toddy, but I am wondering one thing. To me, this product feels and smells exactly like Sparkling Soda from the Drybar line. I can't help but wonder if it's the same thing with a different label? Anyhow, if you hate the way most thermal protectants feel, you'll probably like this.

reviews.headline: Good heat protectant, but scent is either love/hate
reviews.comments: I think it protects my hair from my hot rollers. I like the scent, but I'm sure it could be off putting from some people.

reviews.headline: The smell gives me a headache, and it made my hair e look fr
reviews.comments: Dont like it

reviews.headline: Would not buy again
reviews.comments: Does not smell like what I thought it would.  Would not buy again.

reviews.headline: Smell is AWFUL
reviews.comments: The smell is SO STRONG. I am not sensitive to scents but this is SO strong. I wont be using the rest of the product. Scent lasts days too.

reviews.headline: Dry bar let me down!
reviews.comments:
I'm always on the hunt for a new heat protectant... This was so disappointing. The smell is absolutely disgusting when someone said in the reviews that it smelled like burnt vanilla cigarettes... I understood as soon as I tried it.

It is disgustingly sticky !!! And I made the mistake of putting it all over my hair before sectioning and straightening it, so to detangler, my hair was a freaking nightmare!!! Sad I used my points on this because now I know it's gonna be a nightmare to try to get them back if I return it it feels like I put a can of dry shampoo in my hair, but it smells disgusting.

reviews.headline: I wouldn't buy again
reviews.comments: Love how it straighten my hair but the smell is horrible

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: Left my hair sticky and looking dried-out!

reviews.headline: horrible smell
reviews.comments: I passionately hate this product just because of the smell. I thought It worked well though to add texture and grip for curling my hair, like a texture spray heat protectant. I just cannot get over how badly this smells. I tried to use it up but at this point it's making my whole bathroom smell horrible for days. smells sickening and like burnt vanilla cigarettes

reviews.headline: Feels great on hair
reviews.comments: This spray is by far the best heat protectant dry spray I've tried and I've tried many! It smells good and feels great. It's not sticky at all. The mist is so fine and doesn't leave any sort of residue like some I've tried.

reviews.headline: Love this for next day heat protection!
reviews.comments: I love this product for next day heat protection. It is great for when I am just touching up my curls or re-straightening. The smell is pleasant and the travel size is so convenient! Definitely recommend Drybar Travel Size Hot Toddy Heat Protection Mist1

media.headline: Best pair for my heated curling brush
media.caption: Travel friendly

media.headline: Protects My Hair Better Than Any Other!
media.caption: Soft & Smooth

faceoff_positive.comments: I was gifted by Dry Bar the Hot Toddy Mist. This is such a great protectant mist. It smells good like a creamy colada. This mist leaves no residue on my dark hair or my brush. It also makes my hair smooth, silky and non sticky.  It's a perfect pair for my curling round brush
faceoff_positive.headline: Best pair for my heated curling brush

faceoff_negative.comments:
I bought this to replace the biolage one that I hated. This Hot Toddy can is small nut comes with a large price. I did not like that it can only be used on dry hair, I prefer to add my product when my hair is damp. The can is aerosol, so the mist chokes you when it comes out. My husband even told me to turn on the fan, but he's so sensitive about girl stuff.... My hair was dry, soft and shiny (I used Dry Bar Liquid Glass) after using my big ceramic round brush and my buttercup blow dryer (I'm all about dry bar!) SIDE NOTE: 
 I don't always flat iron my hair, so I want something that also protects against the heat from the blow dryer. So I was left with pretty shiny hair with a curl at the ends. I applied the Hot Toddy spray and it was like I added a dull layer of spray over my hair, then I flat ironed it. The result was not one I was happy with at all, I could not run my fingers through my hair anymore and my shine was completely gone. I want heat protection and shine, I know there are other products out there that offer both but come with a price tag. This product has a laundry list of not so great ingredients. So if you're willing to dish out the money and are not worried about having the all natural, paraben free blah blah blah stuff. Keep looking, Paul Mitchell has a few good ones, comparable in price. I have very tick hair, past my shoulders and is color treated only at the roots very 6 weeks. I have a natural wave and lots of frizz. I hope this helps someone!
faceoff_negative.headline: Not as great as I thought it would be!

rollup.name: Hot Toddy Heat Protectant Mist Coconut Colada Scent
